text: Gustavo Rojo (5 September 1923 - 22 April 2017) was a Uruguayan movie actor and producer. He has appeared in more than 100 movies since 1944. He is known for his roles in Tarzan and the Mermaids (1948), The Evil Forest (1951), Action of the Tiger (1957), and in The Valley of Gwangi (1969). Rojo died on 22 April 2017 in Mexico City at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Movie actors Category:Movie producers Category:Actors from Montevideo
title: Gustavo Rojo
